title: Technic Elepower Compatibility
name: technic_elepower_compat
short_description: Technic machines can make items from Elepower. Elepower machines can make items from Technic. A new power converter connects Technic cables to Elepower conduits when enabled.
long_description: A collaboration project with Bob64 aka DustyBagel to help Technic and Elepower work together. Recipes were added for Technic machines to make some items from Elepower and for Elepower machines to make some items from Technic. A new electric converter will later be added to connect Technic and Elepower grids together. This is an expanded replacement of Grinder Compatibility.
